definition: oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
interactions between heaven and mankind (Han Dynasty doctrine)

sentences.english: The general principle of Chinese world view and culture is the harmony between the heaven and human.
sentences.chinese: 中國的宇宙觀和文化總綱是天人合一。

sentences.english: From the process of human being's cognition on relation of man and nature, this paper gives some explanation on systematic dialectics.
sentences.chinese: 從人類關於天人關係的認識歷程對此作一解讀。

sentences.english: If the log is taken away by a deva, it won't reach the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 如果大木頭被天人所取，它就不會到達大海。

sentences.english: The interpenetration of Nature and Man is a practical base of humanized nature of imagery thinking.
sentences.chinese: 天人互參構成了意象思維人化自然的實踐性基礎。

sentences.english: Mencius thinks that Heaven and human beings are interlinked.
sentences.chinese: 關於天人關係，孟子認爲天與人二者是相通的。

sentences.english: "Exhaustion of nature" in Confucianism becomes the human-nature-unity systematic theory.
sentences.chinese: 儒家的“儘性”學說，成爲天人合一的系統理論。

sentences.english: Yi of fall nine black, and clear and ann.
sentences.chinese: 羿昔落九烏，天人清且安。

sentences.english: Jesus, to Thee be all glory given;
sentences.chinese: 天人諸榮耀完全歸主一身。

sentences.english: "person" occupied a dominant position in the relationship between the Heaven and Man in "The Book of History".
sentences.chinese: “人”在《尚書》中的天人關係中佔有主導地位。

sentences.english: It is an obvious cultural feature to emphasize the harmony between Heaven and Man in Han Shu.
sentences.chinese: 強調天人諧調構成了《漢書》的一大文化特色。

sentences.english: Although his view of "nature-man integral whole" contained certain fate element, it put more emphasis more the human factor.
sentences.chinese: 其天人觀雖存在天命思想因素，但更多的是強調人事。

sentences.english: As "ZhuangShengXiao fan butterfly dream", nature and humanity.
sentences.chinese: 就如同同“莊生曉夢迷蝴蝶”，天人合一。

sentences.english: The relationship between nature and man is the departure point for criticism civilization.
sentences.chinese: 道物關係及道物演化史是天人關係的自然基礎。

sentences.english: The relationship between Heaven and Man is a basic theory of Chinese traditional philosophy .
sentences.chinese: 天人關係是中國傳統哲學的基本問題。

sentences.english: Don't tell me that eating raw meat like a primitive person is the best way to be.
sentences.chinese: 天人合一，難道生活在茹毛飲血的原始時代纔是最好？

sentences.english: Way to fix all the blessing of a day, but without the virtue of nature, natural disposition is aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 修羅道衆生有天的福，但無天人之德，生性好鬥。

definition: Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
